headline.main: THOMAS CONDEMNED BY SOCIALIST GROUP; He Does Not Represent Old Debs Movement, Say Californians

lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, Calif., June 1 -- The Social Democratic Federation of California has issued a public statement declaring that Norman Thomas, "Socialist leader," does not represent the once influential American Socialist movement of Eugene V. Debs, Victor L. Berger, Benjamin Hanford and their modern followers.
abstract: Socialist Dem Fed of Calif compares war stand with that of N Thomas
